modName: R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor - UNPB BBP
summary: A conversion of the Eisen Platte Armor by NPR / KURESE for UNPB-BBP with working weight slider. It requires KURESE\'s original mod.
descriptionHtml:
A conversion of the Eisen Platte Armor by NPR / KURESE for UNPB-BBP with working weight slider. It requires KURESE\'s original mod.

English is not my native language so sorry for my mistakes.

Required mods (don\'t forget to endorse them):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11050]R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor for UNP and CBBE V3 V2[/url] (the UNP version)
The UNPB body replacer with BBP support: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/]UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/]Troublemakers Clothing[/url]

Update 0.2:
Added a non BBP version as an optional file, compatible with either version of the UNPB mod. It is not a patch, has the same contents than the initial version.
Also this version will not CTD your game as it does not require a BBP skeleton.

Installation:
First install the required mods
Use NMM and overwrite when asked. Say no to upgrade.
Manual installation: open archive, extract meshes folder into data folder and overwrite when asked.

Known issues:
Missing arms in 1st person when the gloves are not equipped. As far as I know it\'s a bug of the original armor. I found a way to fix it:
1. Delete 1stC_0.nif and 1stC_1.nif from the folder \"meshes\\R18Pn\\Armor\\Eisen\" 
2. Make a copy of cuirass_0.nif and rename the copy to 1stC_0.nif
3. Do the same with cuirass_1.nif and 1stC_1.nif
4. repeat steps 1-3 with the folder \"meshes\\R18Pn\\Armor\\Eisen\\BK\" 

Credits and thanks:
NPR / KURESE for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11050]R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor for UNP and CBBE V3 V2[/url]
calyps and xp32 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
author: belisariu
